name: RoboKid: Factory Escape
description:
Play as a Robo Kid as you go find your missing body parts and escape a factory! Learn how to use your body parts you collect to accomplish puzzles and complete challenges in this puzzle platformer game! Collect gears as you play and see how many you get at the end!

Team members:

Giandra Hutama - Lead Level designer

Arman Jordan - Lead Artist

Gabriel Rivera - Lead Programmer
